titleStmt.title: Twenty five sermons. The second volume by the Right Reverend Father in God, Ralph Brownrig, late Lord Bishop of Exeter ; published by William Martyn, M.A., sometimes preacher at the Rolls.
Sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Brownrig, Ralph, 1592-1659.
Martyn, William.
Faithorne, William, 1616-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft for John Martyn and James Allestry ...,

notesStmt.note: Contains engraved frontispiece portrait of Bishop Brownrigg signed: W. Faithorne sculp.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
